seo: 用友U8,CRM,uploadfile,文件上传,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测用友U8 CRM系统的uploadfile.php文件是否存在任意文件上传漏洞，通过构造恶意POST请求尝试上传PHP文件并验证上传成功与否。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the uploadfile.php file in Yonyou U8 CRM system has an arbitrary file upload vulnerability. It attempts to upload a malicious PHP file via a crafted POST request and verifies the success of the upload.
